issue.title: [CF 190] timer bar trouble
issue.body:
if timer offset > duration, timer bar is hide when duration over.

Version 4.1.3


> Posted by CurseForge user CrazyProg | Imported from CurseForge issue #190 | Raw

comments.body:
Hmm, I think I am actually going to have to leave it as it is. To allow it to continue to run down even once the duration is zero, I would have to keep the old duration and start time, but there would be no way to detect when an icon changes from one thing to another with a duration of zero without a bunch more code taking up precious CPU cycles, so the rate of decay would end up looking really weird when things change, and I would have to tax people with extra CPU usage that they aren't getting anything out of.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
